---
title: "AmazonAnalysis"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
library(vroom)
```
```{r}
#| include: false
train_data <- vroom("train.csv")
test_data <- vroom("test.csv")
```

```{r}
weather_bar_plot <- ggplot(train_data, aes(x = weather, y = mean_rentals)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "steelblue") +
  labs(title = "Counts of Each Weather Type By Hour",
       x = "Category",
       y = "Count") +
  theme_minimal()
```
